website_summaries.verdict: A premium mattress that is ideal for those who demand nothing less than a good night's sleep.
pros: Mattress conforms to the body to provide maximum comfort and support
Infused with green tea extract to help the mattress maintain a fresh feel
Features high-density foam layers that guarantee supreme durability and stability
cons: Mattress sometimes emits a pungent odor
May be too soft for some users

website_summaries.verdict: Comfort, cooling technology, and a decent price point make the Cocoon a great choice for anyone who wants to give a bed-in-a-box mattress a try without spending a great deal of money.
pros: Offers cooling comfort, with 4 layers of dense foam and a durable cover that's made of stretch knit material that absorbs heat
Absorbs motion so you won't be disturbed when your partner moves
Comes with a 100-night sleep trail and fuss-free returns
cons: Rare reports of customers not being happy with the level of support, but most who own it say it provides the best sleep they've ever had

customer_reviews.title: Mattress had Mold
customer_reviews.text: Worst mattress. Not only did this mattress become covered in black mold but it was growing from within the mattress. We followed every recommendation and precaution to take care of our mattress including cover and storage. You can see through the pictures it’s not a little mold but riddled throughout the entire mattress. AND WE ONLY HAD IT 9 MONTHS. See pictures. Worst mattress. Worst sleeping experience due to mold that made us sick.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Blaser

customer_reviews.title: The smell is HORRIBLE.  Amazon issue!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Zinus mattress. I ordered the first one directly from Zinus and it was perfect. I just opened this one today and the smell is TERRIBLE. A combination of old moldy, musty foam and dirty crotch (sorry but it’s true...and I’m a ER nurse so yep I’ve smelled it all). I will follow up my review in the next few days and see where we are with the smell but it’s disgusting. And again, the one purchased directly from Zinus had a pleasant almost minty smell.... Pretty disappointed - I would have rather paid full price than deal with this smell. Stay tuned for an update...
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C

customer_reviews.title: Contains fiberglass do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this mattress. The green tea layer is full of fiberglass. There is no warning on the cover for the bed. Our nephew wet the bed, when my finacee went to clean it he made a dire mistake of cutting the stocking off to clean the foam layer. Fiberglass filament is everywhere. We have to hire a remediation company to come out and decontaminate our room.
customer_reviews.author: Punkrockgirl

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising // Photographic Proof Included
customer_reviews.text: This item only expands to 10 inches. I verified with two different measuring devices (Stanley Lever Lock 30' tape measure and a cloth-type 10' measuring tape). I followed the package instructions precisely. The bed was unrolled onto a hard, flat surface and nothing was placed on it for the appropriate period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Crimson

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed- DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed with the reviews I saw for this product and decided to give it a try and received it exactly a week ago. It decompressed pretty quickly, however it is still uneven and very uncomfortable even today, It is not aligning with the bed on any corner -looks like a huge saucer on the bed, nothing like the advertised picture. I just wanted to give it enough time before writing a bad review but it has been a week and it doesn't feel any better, stopped sleeping on it due to uneven sleeping posture. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone. Cons: Uneven, uncomfortable, bad fit, not even close to the expectations.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: The smell got a little better but here over 2 months later and the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my granddaughters mattress and when we opened it had a very strong almost musty smell...I read the instructions and did what it said...no covers just let it sit out for a few days...still smelled after a week just thought it needed more time. The smell got a little better but here over 2 months later and the smell is still here. My daughter slept in it and it gives her s headache. My advice if the smell is there 5 days later return it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Molded without any exposure to water.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mattress for a year. It is very comfortable. The mattress has been in a water proof cover since I bought it. We have had no floods. When we were moving the bed to install carpet I saw dark spots under the protective cover. When I unzipped the cover and then the other cover the mattress came is I found it covered in mold. I immediately contacted customer service. They have informed me they don't cover spills or accidents that result in mold. So my advice is don't buy this mattress unless you plan on getting a new one in a year. It is cheap but mold is never worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: HEALTH HAZARD! Ordered it, returned it. Toxic mold smell will never leave.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the bed. Let it air our for 2 weeks. It grew close to 12 inches, but the smell never dissipated. We never slept on it, only left it in the living room to air out. The smell filled the house. After a few days we all became suspiciously sick with a "summer chest cold." Not a coincidence! The zipper was stuck by factory force so consumers cannot unzip to reveal moldy mattress under cover. One reviewer managed to unzip their cover to show the mold underneath, so I think they decided to make it inaccessible purposely. This merits legal action against the company Zinus. I will be speaking with a lawyer. This is "Amazon's Choice?"
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this had a single good review... we’ve had ours about 3 weeks and it still hasn’t inflated completely, it’s sunken in and sinks in even deeper when my son gets into bed. He’s THREE! The smell has still not dissipated and if I leave his door closed for the day, his room reeks like chemicals once I open the door. I don’t know how I could possibly get this back in the box to return it so I guess it’s going to the dump. DO NOT ORDER THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: ashleyann

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a soft cushy bed and this was like a brick
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a soft cushy bed and this was like a brick. Its soft to the touch until you lay your whole body on it and the plush is minimal. I ended up getting a standard pillow top bed after trying another memory foam bed. Apparently, people who like memory foam stick with memory foam and people who like regular beds don't do well on foam. There is more give to the pillow top where the memory foam bottoms out after a few inches of plush. I even tried a hybrid and wasn't satisfied. So I bought the Pleasant Mattress sunset pillow top ( I couldn't find it in Amazon) for about $500.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Loren

customer_reviews.title: Get something else that doesn't have tea infused into it.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry guys, this mattress has that tea infusion and it STINKS! We bought it back in November, and haven't yet been able to use it. Why? It still stinks! Used Febreeze, vinegar/water/aired it out/etc and it still smells. And this is the very end of January. It may be good for you, but we still can't use it. I am supposed to be able to return it but there's no way I am putting it back in a box (impossible to do), and paying for shipping. Right now, it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: aileronguy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This bed is not plush. I'm not sure why some reviewers have been saying it is. I try my best to do honest reviews on all my purchases and this purchase let me down. I figured this mattress would soften up after a while, like some other reviewers explained. But it hasn't. I'm not pick up or anything but I know how a bad matters feels. Heck, our extremely low spring matters I had before this is actually better. I wish I could return it but I think you have to put it back in its original package which is near impossible...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Not 12" thick.
customer_reviews.text: They SAY this is a 12 inch mattress. This is incorrect. This mattress showed up in a box that indicated it should've been the 12" model, had a tag that said it was the 12" model, and yet... after a week, it had only expanded to 9". Amazon sent me a replacement, but the replacement was also only 9" thick. I mean, it's fine. It's comfortable. But don't order this expecting a 12" thick mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Corsillo

customer_reviews.title: Not as dense and the middle goes down
customer_reviews.text: The Signature Sleep memory foam mattress line is better in terms of density. I bought one of these for one guest room and the Signature Sleep one for the other, and all 10/10 guests have rated the other higher. The price is relatively the same, maybe $20 of a difference; but in terms of sleep comfort, there is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: The Hams

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is not handling returns well for this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I got 12inch queen size mattress, it had issues decompressing completely. Later it started giving me back pain and shoulder pain. When I asked for return, they asked me to arrange the box for such monster sized mattress for pickup. When I asked where to get it, they did not help. They should alteast help with the box and customer can cover it. Absolutely hate them now!
customer_reviews.author: Aparna

customer_reviews.title: We still love  💕 our Mattress after 3 years!!
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this because I feel like I need give a good review. I have chronic back pain. I am only 37. I have had it for about 10 years. 3 years ago I thought oh we need a new mattress maybe that will solve. Well it didn’t but it helped. I just found out I have Ankylosing Spondylitis. Which is very painful in your back and hips. I sleep terrible. This mattress plus a memory foam topper with a feather bead have made a huge difference. Especially on days I hurt bad. I recommend this to anyone with back issues!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Mattress did not expand the way it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this, we've had it for over a week now. We gave it a full 48 hours to expand, and it didn't. One end expanded to about 7 inches, the other end expanded to about 8 inches and the middle expanded to 11 inches. It's like trying lay on top of a hill. We bought another mattress from Zinus a few months ago for our son and we were very happy with that one, This one however is a complete disappointment. I've left V-mail with Zinus support but haven't hear back yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Schmidtke

customer_reviews.title: Loaded with fiberglass and cost me thousands in damage
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing on any label saying not to remove the cover. My dog had an injury to his paw and jumped on the bed which left a bloody stain. Naturally I tried to get rid of the stain. Didn’t work so I took the cover off to wash it. Biggest mistake of my life. All of my pets that jumped on the bed got covered in fiberglass and my room had to be super deep cleaned. I had to throw away all blankets and pillows associated with that bed. Anything that touched it or was in the room. My whole family is still itching and sneezing. This is so messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Katja

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress for the cost. Much firmer than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed. It's a lot firmer than I would have guessed. It's not all memory foam, it's several different layers of different foam. Not saying that's bad, just stating. Im a pretty big dude, and I only sink in it a little. I was surprised by this as I have had numerous other memory foam products and they were a lot squishier. It was heavy as heck but easy enough to unpack. Definitely unpack it in the room you want it to stay in, once it is unpacked, it's hard to move.
customer_reviews.author: chas

customer_reviews.title: Great At First But FAILS Later
customer_reviews.text: Friends. I really REALLY wanted this to work. Mattress was great at first but then quickly settles into a permanent firm compression where we sleep. There's a taller mound in the middle of the mattress that still has normal foam such that it's like sleeping on a "W". It's true, I guess, that you get what you pay for. It was a waste of money. I wish I could get my money back on this. With tight finances, we can't afford yet another mattress. I hope that this helps you.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: chemical smell has never disappeared, and thick foam makes turning over difficult
customer_reviews.text: bought this based on the positive amazon reviews. hoped it would be supportive/firm and also ease joint pains, which is what other reviewers stated. for me, however, the mattress is terrible. first, the smell has never completely dissipated, in spite of the mattress being open/expanded for over a week. the chemicals make me congested and give me headaches. second, the thick layer of memory foam on the top of the mattress makes it very difficult for me to move/roll over. that might not be an issue for younger or more agile people. on the plus side, i am using this mattress on a metal bed frame without a box spring, and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: greens

customer_reviews.title: STINKS
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is a disappointment because it stinks. The comfort of it is fine, but it smells up the entire room and you can smell it as you walk by the room. It’s stinking up the entire house. I see people here say that it smells like mold and I would agree but I don’t see any mold on it. Maybe it’s the smell of old rotting tea leaves? Whatever it is, it’s unbearable. Now I have to figure out how to get rid of it. Who wants a stinky mattress?
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My mattress arrived but despite following instructions and leaving it out to air for over 3-4 days it has not expanded correctly on one side of the bed. The mattress is unusable. I contacted the zinus customer support (2 emails with pictures of the expanded mattress & several phone calls), however there is no response whatsoever. No one answers their phone. Not even an acknowledgement of my problem. This product can't even be shipped back because it is now in the expanded state. Stay away from this mattress, it is a gamble!
customer_reviews.author: vmr

customer_reviews.title: My new mattress smells like mildew.
customer_reviews.text: I received my mattress on December 13th 2017 and as of January 11th 2018 it smells like mildew. I have not put a cover on it but allowed it to continue to air out, and it still smells. I'm concerned that sleeping on this mattress will impact my health. I'm at the point that I want to throw it out but it is very heavy and I have to find help to move it. Amazon customer service was great; I received a full refund :)
customer_reviews.author: LA girl

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to set up, comfortable, reasonably priced....no smell here
customer_reviews.text: After doing A LOT of research and hearing from a friend who bought this bed, I made the leap and purchased it. I was a little nervous based on some of the reviews stating the mattress smelled or did not decompress. We opened our mattress (which stated it was packed in February) and it began decompressing right away. Only took 5 hours to get to its full height. There was no smell or off gassing at all, so not sure if we were just lucky or what. We all think it is pretty danged comfortable but we will review and update later after it has been slept on for a bit. So far, we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Olystacy B

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass
customer_reviews.text: FIBERGLASS !!!! There is a very large amount of loose fiberglass in this mattress. They claim there are two covers and the secondary one is what contains the fiberglass and keeps it from being a problem but as soon as I started sleeping here I started having symptoms of inhaling fine fiberglass. My throat has been raw with zero symptoms of being sick. Visible fiberglass pieces on the external mattress topper after spot cleaning a spill as recommended, veerryyyy disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Harrison

customer_reviews.title: M O L D  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! I received my king size bed on 12-20-17 Its been 9 days and the MOLD smell only grows worse. I now feel sick and have a sore throat from this bed. I have owned other foam beds and the small only last 36 hours or so. I also just wrote the company directly to see what can be done. I can no longer sleep on this bed its that damn bad. I will update this once I hear back from the company and after I open up the cover. Something went very wrong with this batch of bedding. Over the past week just look at how many people are experiencing the same issue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received 10 inch instead of 12 inch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12 inch mattress after sleeping on one at the beach a few weeks ago.. my aches and pains went away while I slept on it. I received my mattress a day before it was to arrive... I unwrapped and followed in instructions to the tee, but the mattress after 4,6, and 24 hrs only measures at 10 inches instead of the 12 I purchased; that's the reason for low star rating.. You will need to order 2 inches shorter than what you truly want
customer_reviews.author: branchc

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value - so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I chose these for our vacation rental because of overwhelming recommendations on a Facebook page dedicated to vacation rental owners. So many owners pointed to THESE mattresses as the way to go for maximum guest comfort and minimal cost. They were right - these are great. We ordered both a King and Queen version. After they were set up, neighbors came over to check on our progress and tried out one of the beds. They immediately asked for the link so that they could order one for themselves. I'm extremely happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KalamityKT

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfy as my old Spa Sensations mattress but still nice!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress has never reached the full 12inches. Its stayed about 11 inches. Weve been sleeping on it about 2 months. We had a Spa Sensations brand memory foam mattress we bought about 8-9 yrs ago that we were replacing, and this new mattress isnt quite as comfy bc its more firm and the edges seem to roll a bit on my husbands side. Hes heavier so that could be why, but didnt happen on our old mattress. Mattress didnt smell and it arrived quickly. Would still recommend and buy again. Cant beat the price. And they last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress! Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Update: 5 months later: The mattress is comfy. I would buy another. No issues and I sleep great. Update: 16 days later. Still a slight odor of paint but much better. Mattress is 12 inches. I noticed the price went way up. Mine was $190. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this mattress overall. It's different than old style but super comfy. The sides hold up stiff better than I imagined as well. Unwrapped it, slight paint smell. Let it inflate overnight to 10 inches. Slept on it. Self inflated to 12 inches within a couple days. Paint smell continued but tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Now Im sad but amazon refunded my money so thats good
customer_reviews.text: I got a dud according to zinus! Never expanded to 12 inches! Mostly 10 1/2 to 9 through out. My back and shoulders hurt every night. I was so excited. Now Im sad but amazon refunded my money so thats good.
customer_reviews.author: Steve varnam

customer_reviews.title: MOLD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is HORRIFIC!!!! I bout this mattress 8 months ago and look at the condition. I change my bedding sheets weekly. The top of the mattress is in perfect condition but upon moving the mattress to re arrange my bedroom furniture I encounter black spots on the bottom part of mattress so when I had my husband unzipped it clearly shows on this video the disgusting magnitud in which I have been sleeping. AMAZON YOU GUYS NEED TO TAKE ACTION, apparently I’m not the only customer affected by this issue! Mold is hazardous to health!!
customer_reviews.author: AntZav

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy people.  NO SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.text: No support. I'm a big guy at 6"5 270. Mattress felt ok at first, but after a month or so my back started to bother me from lack of support.. Very soft cheap Chinese made mattress. Maybe it's ok if you're under 200lbs.. or for a spare bedroom.. I'll be throwing this one out as You only have a short time to return this and my window has passed. At least it's cheap.. But real mattress companies give you 90 days or more to return, which would have given mule time to realize how bad this mattress is for a heavy person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read most current negative comments before purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Before you purchase this mattress make sure you go to reviews, click verified, click most recent, click 1 star only. In May 2018 there are about 100 that complain of smell. This is also what I am complaining about. Unusable. Amazon is taking care of it, thanks Amazon. But getting rid of it will be a problem. It comes in a small box, blows up to queen size. I own 2 similar that are wonderful, about 5 years on oldest one, it is still like new and I sleep on it nightly. Something is wrong with there manufacturing now. Too bad because it use to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard R

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually insanely comfortable. It arrived in the box and went up to full size pretty quick. We unwrapped it early in the afternoon and slept on it that night! It felt super firm at first but has definitely softened up over time. It also felt firm just because we had an old plush mattress before so it was an adjustment. We’ve has it for about 6 months so far and have no complaints!!! We sleep great every night and haven’t noticed any dipping. There was no chemical smell when it arrived. Highly recommend, especially for the price!!!! A great mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lilley

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress , but after several months the fiberglass breaks loose and will drive you nuts!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great mattress but the cover will pass fiberglass fibers onto anything placed on it. When we ordered this mattress we ordered a zip up mattress cover. It was installed over the mattress. After about 11 months we took it off to wash it. While washing it we placed shirts which were just washed and folded on it. We had to buy new shirts and pants since we could not get the fibers out. We did not take off the factory cover at all. Now we are thinking about buying a plastic cover for a permanent barrier. I still find shirts which itch like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: SLG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable, supportive mattress
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress in January 2017 and I am still super happy with it. I recommend it anytime somebody mentions needing a mattress. It is really comfortable; it doesn’t get hot like other memory foam I have owned, it is soft enough to feel comfortable but firm enough to provide support, and it has held up really well in the 3 1/2 years that I’ve had it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: 10 months use, memory Foam not recovering shape: I would now not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Edit: After 10 months of use, the mattress foam is not recovering shape, even after 12 hours. The mattress shape stays the same after sleep, so cant sleep the whole night. Have been using this mattress since 5 months now and that has prompted me to change the rating from 5 to 2. The mattress is turning out to be very soft that it has started hurting my back. I would now not recommend it, after using it for 5 months Mattress smells for a first couple of days, but that's expected and is explicitly mentioned in the papers included in the package. On the fifth day, the mattress height is 11.5 inches, I think this is alright now.
customer_reviews.author: Nisarg

customer_reviews.title: Doughy & Uncomfortable Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Did not find this mattress comfortable at all, and unfortunately I didn’t unbox it it right away (bought it prior to moving into a new home), so it cannot be returned. It has a very doughy feel, holds its memory foam indentations for a long time and not supportive if you have any minor back issues. It’s a true memory foam mattress, no inner coils, etc. Also not sure if it will ever “inflate” to its full 12 inches, and one corner just refuses to level out. Horrible. Because it can’t be returned, it will be relegated to the guest room for guests. Which after sleeping on it, they probably won’t be visiting again.
customer_reviews.author: Feli Cristi

customer_reviews.title: really like these
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why the price fluctuates over $125 or more, but given currency swings and the strength of the dollar, supply, etc, make sense. That aside this is a great mattress. I bought one after my friend bought 3 for guests. I have spent several weeks on one. I might switch it to my primary mattress over a traditional coil spring model.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bite the hype
customer_reviews.text: Beware!!! If I could give 0 stars I would. First off this mattress is horrible to sleep in and I’ve never had back pain in my life before sleeping in this bed. Second BUYING IT THROUGH AMAZON ONLY GIVES YOU 30days NOT 100 from the manufacturer. Poor customer service from Amazon and Zinus. You should stand behind your product. Now I have to eat the cost AND pay to have it removed
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: VERY Firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress came quickly and was easy to unpack and expanded quickly. As it said there was no odor. However, after sleeping on it for two weeks, the mattress is very firm. It is not med-firm, it is firm. So I wanted to return it and get a softer one. Amazon is willing to return it but I have to repack the expanded mattress and get it to a UPS drop off. No issues with the product itself, just know what you are buying and it will be a pain to return if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: We got it in two days. The entire thing rolled up and air vacuumed into a box. Heavy box for average old person, would need two people to move around. Once we cut it open, it started to air up and get really thick! Now everyone keeps fighting to sleep on this foam queen mattress. We're thinking about getting another one for the guest room. Buy this. Totally worth it. P.S. Had a weird smell out of the vacuum seal, but after 24 hours, no more smell. It took less than 30 minutes to pump up to full thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Remove cover
customer_reviews.text: This mattress has fiberglass and I had a really bad experience with it. I removed the cover to wash it and now its everywhere, in every single cloth in the house and it itches like crazy. I have to throw out the bed, bedsheet, pillows and all my cloths. It is a really bad experience.
customer_reviews.author: Gautam B

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress - but ...
customer_reviews.text: After almost two years I give this mattress five stars ... BUT I am going to caution anyone who purchases it. If you are heavy/overweight like I am, please make sure you have extra support. Initial reviews of this indicated I did not need a box spring, so I purchased the platform metal base linked below. I have to rotate my mattress far more than I should - again, mostly because I am overweight. If you are overweight and purchasing this mattress, please do yourself a favor and purchase a solid base platform.
customer_reviews.author: iMike

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal- the goods and bads
customer_reviews.text: The good- this mattress is SO comfortable. I’m a stomach sleeper and it isn’t too soft but not too firm either. It was easy to unpackaged even all by myself. The total weight was about 70 pounds. The price is unbeatable! The bad- as seen in other reviews, the 12 inches did not fully expand. You’ll get about 10 max. I don’t know why, possibly because of what it is made out of but this mattress absolutely wreaks. It has sort of a toxic/chemical/burnt smell to it. Not sure how long it’s supposed to last. I’ll update in about a month so see how it’s holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Zinus 9 out of 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: 1) For the people who inquire about temperature: I'm usually on the warm side. This mattress is a little warm but not horrible. The comfort and support outweighs the slight warmth factor. (This will be a plus in winter.) 2) For the people who inquire about the chemical smell: I let my Zinus inflate for 48 hours, door closed, while running an air purifier. Odor was eliminated. 3) For the people who inquire about comfort: this mattress is soft but firm. Great support. I sleep on my back and my side. I know the 'soft but firm' makes no sense, but all the reviews on here are subjective, so what can you do? Hope this helps. I love my Zinus.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Went from great to crap in 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: After it was set up and sat for a few days...this 12" thick mattress was the best thing I had slept on in years. Firm yet gave in all the right areas. Within 3 months, I noticed it starting to soften quite a bit. I decided to spin the foot to the head and sleep on it it in different areas as to not be in the same spot every night but within another 2 months the whole thing is mushy except the part next to the wall where I don't really sleep. VERY disappointed in the quality of this mattress. I don't suppose a couple years of decent use would too much to ask for?
customer_reviews.author: MOzarkMom

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress—a steal for $300
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased to say I wasn’t one of the customers that received a mattress that wouldn’t expand all the way or that had mold. There was no chemically smell either. Mine started expanding as soon as I took it from the box, and I let it sit in the middle of my living room still in the plastic overnight just in case it had more expanding to do. I should mention that I like a firm mattress because of my lower back issues. I added a two inch mattress topper for a little more comfort. Now I don’t wake up with lower back pain, and I hate to leave my bed every morning.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Our Second a Time Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we have purchased this product because my daughter said it was the most comfortable mattress topper she had ever slept on. We purchased the first one three years ago but it was destroyed in a flood. We were thrilled to see that it was still available and for almost the same price. It was deliver quickly and only needed a few hours after removed from the packaging to be sleep ready. We are purchasing another for our guest room. Can’t beat the price for the comfort!
customer_reviews.author: McFunFamily

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL SMELL - BIG MISTAKE
customer_reviews.text: AWFUL CHEMICAL SMELL!!! It's been weeks of airing out. I even decided to sleep elsewhere for three nights because the smell was so strong and to give it additional time to air out yet it continues to linger throughout the entire apartment no matter what I do. This was a featured as a special sale item on Amazon back in December, so I decided to order it since it also had so many great reviews. BIG MISTAKE. And it seems many others are having the same exact problem recently. I got the queen - FYI. You get what you pay for, I guess. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: charm13

customer_reviews.title: When we first got the mattress we loved it. However the warranty on the website claims ...
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year and the bed is to uncomfortable to sleep on. More back pain than my previous box spring mattress of 5 years. When we first got the mattress we loved it. However the warranty on the website claims to not cover what we are experiencing. Where we sleep the bed is sunk in like homer Simpson's bed... We have rotated the bed and never spilled a thing on it. Very disappointed and will never buy from this manufacturer again. Literally not even 10 months old...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still great after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress 2 years ago and it is still holding up great! My partner and I are not small people and although it is a little more broken in than when we first got it, it is still in great condition. Very comfortable. Got it to replace an 8 year old mattress from a big box mattress store and we both slept so much better instantly. We also got the Zinus bed frame, plenty of support. Highly recommend and you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: What do I do
customer_reviews.text: I am actually only giving this a three for the moment... I have a sinus 8 inch and it was absolute heaven... So I thought I would try the 12 because I could never find sheets for the other....I have no idea the 12 was so much softer I literally sink into it and woke up with every single body part Charlie horsed. My question is now that I am open this and laid on it one night... How can I exchange it for a 10 inch...or eight inch I can’t exactly send this backj
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress not soft like other reviews
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is hard and difficult to sleep on. So many reviews claims it's soft and you sink into it, definitely not. The mattress was expanded to the full 12 inches for nearly a week. If you're not sure you're going to like it, be prepared to vacuum pack it back into the box, that took at least and hour and a half of vacuuming after sealing the original packaging with duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: sierrabravo1984

customer_reviews.title: I urge anyone thinking about getting this bed, DO IT! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is an amazing bed! It is a little more firm than expected compared to mattress toppers but thats what I wanted anyway! It is very good quality. I think it’s amazing that you can have a nice big bed shipped to you in an approx 4fTx2.5FT box and when you open it, it expands itself, totally Jetsons kind of stuff! I know that several years ago when the mall had the stores with memory foam beds that cost thousands of dollars but now that cost is largely slashed by shipping straight from the warehouse, I suppose! I urge anyone, if you are thinking about getting one, DO IT you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mackenzie Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Referred several for this mattress on Airbnb
customer_reviews.text: "The most comfy nights sleep" "Can I ask, where did you find this mattress" "Best nights' sleep ever. I love this mattress!" are some of the comments we have received from our Airbnb customers. In 2015, I stayed at an Airbnb and had the best sleep in 10 years. I flipped the mattress around and located the tag. Since then, eight family members have purchased the mattress and we have referred over 40 Airbnb customers for this mattress on Amazon. Thanks for the great sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Janie Hall

customer_reviews.title: This mattress reeks of mold. After reading another review ...
customer_reviews.text: This mattress reeks of mold. After reading another review, i decided to unzip the cover. How convenient. There is no zipper pull tab on the zipper and after i uncover the slider, it doesn't work. Really curious to see what is lurking...worried about mold...also corners do not recover (See picture). Also you CAN return it. Watch YOUTUBE for how to shrink and ship it back! I did get ahold of amazon customer service and they were very apologetic and helpful. They are reshipping a new one and the old one is going back. Hoping this was just a issue of bad storage and that the new one will be better. I really want to love this.
customer_reviews.author: Joellyn

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I brought this mattress for my spare bedroom which my daughter sleeps in when she stays every other weekend. I've only had it a month and already it's sunken in the spot she lays which is close to the edge of the bed. She's 28, 145lbs! She never complained about the same mattress she has which is why I bought this one. I layed on the bed and found it to be uncomfortable because that spot kept pulling me in, I had to completely move to the other side of the bed to get comfortable. It maybe ok for a small child or if you don't sleep in the same spot everytime!
customer_reviews.author: Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress I've ever (not) slept on
customer_reviews.text: NOT ideal for side sleepers. NOT ideal for back sleepers. NOT ideal for sleeping, PERIOD. This thing feels like I'm sleeping on a rock. I can feel uncomfortable pressure on my shoulder, side and hip the minute I lay down on it. It expanded to the full 12" within two days, but it's so uncomfortable I might as well be sleeping on the floor. What a piece of garbage. I truly envy all the people that said this thing is great. I have serious doubts that UPS will pick this thing up, so I'm probably going to screwed out of the money and be unable to buy something to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Bounds

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd zinus mattress I’ve purchased. The first one was very comfortable, but ruined by my dumb cat. And since the price is right, it was easier to buy another than attempt to rid the other of pee. But the 2nd mattress was not the same at all, and hard as a rock. So uncomfortable that we bought a Casper on the third night. And if returning the mattress was possible it wouldn’t be in our spare bedroom for our poor guests to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress I've ever slept on. Hard as the floor.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man and I weigh 195 pounds and I don't sink even one inch into the foam. This mattress was never soft and hasn't softened in the 18 months that I've had it. It is now impossible to sleep on because it hurts my body so badly. I regret this purchase and it makes me angry that I wasted my money on this mattress against my better judgment.
customer_reviews.author: Blazius

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!! Great mattress!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mattress! But be warned....it definitely feels different than a traditional mattress/boxspring set up. Very supportive. Had no problems setting it up. I placed the bagged, compressed mattress on my new Zinus bed frame, cut the bag around the edges and let the magic begin. I waited about 48 hours before I actually put sheets on itand slept on it. And, actually my last measurement was only 11 3/4 inches, not quite 12 inches, but I am definitely not complaining. I never noticed any chemical smell that some of the other posters have mentioned. Very happy with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Most painful sleep I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is good for about 6 months tops. Unless you prefer waking up achey and cranky with itchy eyes. You get what you pay for. Not a good buy. I’ve had this for two years and I’ve tried to ignore the problems it’s causing. I’ve been waking up with an achey back for a year now. We thought our itchy eyes were from pet dander, then I read there’s fiberglass in it. Just overall disappointing and a waste of money. Sleeping on the living room floor is much more comfortable and I wake up feeling more refreshed than I do in this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!  Firm bed lovers, this is your dream bed!
customer_reviews.text: I picked this mattress by reviews, I LOVE IT! I’ve had it over 60 days now and never have I slept better and physically felt better in the morning. No issues with the mattress at all. It didn’t have any smell at all when unboxing. It rose to its full height within 10 hrs. If you like a firm mattress with about 2” of memory foam cushion on top, this bed is for you. I’ve had back surgery, laminectomy & discectomy, and this makes my back so happy! I recommended it to my sister in-law who bought two of them and she and her son love their beds. The bed springs right back, no sink holes or divots.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Much harder than I expected.  Had to add a topper to soften it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality mattress, doesn't smell bad, great shipping, easy to unpack etc... but too hard for my taste. They say it's a medium, but to me it's VERY firm. We purchased a Linenspa 2" Gel infused matress topper. This added just the right amount of softness and we sleep much cooler.  So I'm happy now, but it needed the topper to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmo

customer_reviews.title: incredibly perfect, like sleeping on marshmallows.
customer_reviews.text: this mattress couldn’t have exceeded my expectations more. i’ve never had a bed-in-a-box before. it was delivered at 630am and i attempted to unbox it myself (small female) and i was able to with a little bit of muscle! a lot of the reviews mention a bad smell which made me nervous but there’s absolutely no smell coming from the mattress. it truly feels like laying on a bed of marshmallow fluff. i tend to prefer really fluffy beds and my husband likes stuff/firm beds; we both love this one! it’s a perfect sweet spot. I definitely recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: adriannexo

customer_reviews.title: BAD PACKING
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several memory foam mattresses from Amazon. This recently purchased mattress would have been fine if it was packed and shipped like all of the others, ROLLED UP END TO END THE WIDTH OF THE MATTRESS. Instead the BONEHEADS folded it in half then in quarters so they could ship it in a shorter box. In the attached picture you can see the hump in the mattress, also the left side did not expand as high as the right side. Actually with the mattress cover off the whole mattress is out of shape. The mattress has been lying flat for 3 days. I will never buy another Zinus mattress and I will be returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: Al Crawford

customer_reviews.title: this is a very good mattress. It is on the firm side
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a very good mattress. It is on the firm side, so be aware if that is an issue for you. If foot-long is important to you, I'd say there is absolutely no way this is a twelve inch mattress--11 at most--but don't start a lawsuit on that ala Subway. Only lawyers come out ahead! :) We've tried and returned two much more expensive mattresses than this one--Tuft and Needle and Bedinabox--and this is the best of the three at a third of the cost. Returning it would be a real challenge, which we knew before buying it. All in all, it's a good mattress that appears to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: HOT, HOT, HOT and NOT in a good way
customer_reviews.text: I live in Michigan, and if my bedroom window wasn't frozen shut, I'd crack it to get some coolness in the room. I believed their "cooling feature" BS in the product description and never thought to check re heat in reviews (plus I was sick with RSV at the time of ordering, so wasn't 100% either). If you peacefully sleep in a room that is between 60-65 degrees, all snuggled up, this mattress is not for you. If you're used to comfortably sleeping in long sleeved t-shirts, leggings and socks but had to sleep in a short-sleeve t-shirt and was still burning up, this mattress is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: JeanW

customer_reviews.title: Does not expand to 12"
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughters room..she says it sleeps good and likes it..my only problem is that it has been three months and it has only expanded to 10"..after a few weeks I had contacted the seller..they told me to give it a little more time..I think after three months ..this is all it is gonna do..could have save about $30 and bought the 10" mattress..but would it have expanded to 8" or 10"?...I added a 4" topper I had bought from Amazon..I guess it will do..they really shouldn't miss lead people on this issue..change your advertisement to 10"/12" so your customers do not not expect a 12" mattress..dropping your price would be the right thing to do..
customer_reviews.author: Prudence S.

customer_reviews.title: Learn from our mistake, and don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Worst mattress after sleeping on it for a year. It was ok for the first few months...then we started having issues. Lower back pain started...issues with hip pain, neck pain, knee pain, then just waking up feeling terrible muscle and joint pain everywhere. Our trial period was up so no return was an option. We’re saving to buy a different mattress, but both my boyfriend and I wake up with horrible back pain every morning after tossing and turning all night. We haven’t gotten a good nights sleep in months. I would give this mattress zero stars if I could. Please don’t buy this product and save your money for something else and learn from our mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The folks complaining about smell/thickness are likely insane
customer_reviews.text: I skeptically purchased this bundle of boxed comfort after reading many poor reviews of an odorous mildew mattress. To be frank, I’m not sure what these folks are talking about. It’s a cheap mattress that offers a lot of bang for the buck AND convenience of free/compact delivery. It’s extremely comfortable and I’m having trouble waking up for work in time. If this mattress is unable to support your body weight then you should have thought of that before buying a hunk of memory foam and looked at a spring mattress. Anyone that needs a comfortable bed quickly for a great price should buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfortable!  Would buy again for the guest room!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress replaced our old bed and I love it! It's my first mattress of this type but for the price it's fantastic. It's a little firmer than I expected because it's gel, but as it turns out, I prefer that type. You could put a bed topper under the sheet for more fluff if you want. I purchased the frame with the grey cloth headboard to go with it, added a bed skirt to hide the metal legs, got new pillows, and I'm completely satisfied. Best of all I don't get bounced around when my husband turns over. I will probably buy another bed like this for my guest room. Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.author: lolacat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: At our first weekend in our new house, we hosted a gaggle of nieces and nephews for their annual cousins’ reunion. Now with enough rooms for everyone to stay with us, we needed enough beds. While on a tight budget and already having one queen and two twin air mattresses, it made the most sense to spring for an actual bed for our official cat-free guest room. This mattress was the unicorn I was looking for! Affordable price, great quality, and very comfortable. It’s the kind of mattress I would have for myself in our master bedroom. Love that it just needs a platform and no box springs.
customer_reviews.author: Library Lil'

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 years later...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of a brand new bed. I had a small budget for someone particularly large and a toddler kiddo who frequently sleeps with me. I am over 300 lbs and 6' tall and this bed has been extremely comfortable this entire time. I have taken the cover off to wash it, because accidents have happened, and we have not experienced a torrential rain of fiberglass. It's important to flip the mattress every couple of months so that it doesn't create a divot in the foam. WELL WORTH THE PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.author: R Pillars

customer_reviews.title: after 2 years, I still look forward to going to bed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait and do this review well after receiving but I didn't count on waiting two years! I love this mattress. It is a bit on the soft side, so if you like it firm, you may want to look at different models. I also do sleep quite warm, so this is probably is not for hotter climates. I live on the cool Oregon coast so its perfect. Thinking about another one for upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Shalio

customer_reviews.title: Recommended Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Honestly surprised with how this product turned out after reading reviews of mold, smell and mattress not expenading to advertised size. I was able to remove mattress from box and plastic plastic myself. I made the MISTAKE of opening plastic wrap in living area and not in bedroom resulting in me having to drag the mattress to the bedroom. Surprisingly this mattress is HEAVY, so be aware, and open it on the bed where you want it to be. It’s very comfortable and molds to your body. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FIRM not for back pain or fibromyalgia
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 140 this mattress is hard. I have fibromyalgia & RA & ehler-danlos so needed a medium soft bed to allow me to sleep. I hope after time & use it softens. Now it’s FIRM hurts my back, shoulders, hips. I do not sink down at all. Bad experience for first time ordering bed online...I read all the raving reviews but if your not a heavy person beware. Very firm I contacted Zinus a Kevin told me only option was for me to purchase a mattress topper. I contacted Amazon support and asked them if I could return mattress. They were fantastic I received refund and I donated mattress.
customer_reviews.author: sheylal

customer_reviews.title: Great for side sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: Five stars all around. This bed did wonders on my sore blue collar back. My old worn out coil spring mattress was really starting to take a toll on my back. I am a side sleeper and this bed is great form me! I've had it for four months and rotate it monthly. It has softened a little. I wonder about it's ability to hold up long term. But either way for the price I paid for a queen, it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Northern

customer_reviews.title: Happy! Happy! Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable mattress. Very good support for a guy the size of an NFL lineman. Reforms much more quickly than my previous memory foam mattress. It takes about 30 seconds after I get off the mattress to stop showing my body impression. No off putting odor after opening plastic wrap. Wrap was 3 layers so no chance of it picking up moisture during transit. I highly recommend to get the thickest mattress if you are a large size. I suggest 2 people to unwrap and install. Queen size weight was about 60 lbs. Much easier to handle that way. I did it myself and worked up a good sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P. Fahy

customer_reviews.title: okay mattress
customer_reviews.text: I don't see this mattress as something to rave about. It's okay. It's pretty firm, not soft and yielding. I didn't sleep well on it, but I also wasn't feeling well the first night I used it. Came in a 4 foot rectangular box. Had to be unfolded and decompressed (meaning I just let it sit on the bed frame while it puffed up on its own). It's fairly heavy, but I pulled it out of the box and unrolled it on my own, so you can do it alone if you have to. Honestly, I've had worse mattresses. This was decent for the price. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: HEATS YOU UP SO BAD! Didn’t fully inflate.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bed. I have woken up every night since I bought it, sweating like mad. I have to sleep without a blanket on altogether just to be able to bear it. Customer service states this is “normal” and that the bed “holds heat”. Why would they advertise it as “cooling”? I don’t even run hot at night! Once you buy it’s impossible to conveniently return so I’m stuck with a $300 bed that I have to put a million cooling toppers on. One of the corners won’t inflate as well. I’ve had this bed for two weeks and all other corners have inflated already. Mattress looks so stupid and is worse to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect when I purchased this mattress. I let set in room temperature as instructed before swapping out mattresses. First night and ever since has been great. The comfort has not let me down and although it took me a few days to get used to not having a spring mattress, I definitely enjoy the design and comfort of this one more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I moved into my first apartment last February and needed to buy EVERYTHING, but didn’t have a ton of $ to spend. My brother had bought this same mattress for his college apartment and was happy with it, so I took a chance on it too. Worked great for me! Slept on it very comfortably, and had no back pain in the morning like I always had sleeping on my old spring mattress at my parents’ house. Over a year later, it retains shape like new and is still in very good condition, so I’m very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! If you like a mattress that hugs you and holds you up, than this is it. The edges aren't that firm, but the main part where you lay on it is. It took a few days for the bed to kinda get "broken" in, but it was worth it. It came pretty quick and was a bit heavy. It didn't take long for it to fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Sanguivora

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress for a month and it's already sunken in the middle as if it's 20 years old. No support. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: MazyCakes

customer_reviews.title: Watch YouTube videos about this mattress first!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting to be asked to review this purchase. This was a big mistake. The bed still smells weeks later. I don't know how to describe the smell but I wouldn't call it green tea! The popularity of this bed is misleading. It's based on price. Only reason I don't return it is it would be a major pain in the ass. The bed is so hard. No bounce. Like a foam rock. How you return it once it's unfolded and unleashed? Positives? It really is 12 inches thick.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Stern

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I admit that I was concerned about the quality in relation to the price... but I am very pleased to report that this is an excellent mattress at any price. It took a long time for it to finally come up to size - mainly on the corners, but after a week it was there. The only reason that it didn't get 5-stars is due to the awful mildewy smell that took a few weeks to finally dissipate and fade away. It wasn't actually mildewed, thankfully, but instead, just the chemical smell of the materials used in manufacturing it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F. Bates, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Hell of a deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress a little over a year ago. It was a little too firm for me, so I added a 3inch memory foam topper and a squishy mattress protector and I now have the most comfortable bed on the planet. It is such a good deal, that even with bedding, memory foam topper and mattress protector I still spent 50% less than I did on my last mattress. We did have several issues. The first mattress they sent us smelled like moldy dirt and the smell would not go away. They sent us a second one, and it wouldn't fully inflate...the third one was a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as a $6000 mattress.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress for our fifth wheel. Let me first say that at home we sleep on a $6000. Temper-Pedic mattress. So we’re a bit picky on what we want to sleep on in our trailer - we had heard from a few friends that told us this was a great mattress, they weren’t kidding. We get a very sound sleep on this mattress in our fifth wheel and just like a Temper-Pedic your partners movement doesn’t transfer through the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fiberglass Destroyed My Apartment!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress since December 2017. It was a great at first, but recently the outside cover tore at the seem of the zipper. I took it off to try and fix it. I know it says not to remove the cover but they should forewarn you that it’s made of fiberglass. My apartment is covered and all of my clothes/linen are destroyed. They should do a better job of containing a mattress that is made of fiberglass. One crappy outside cover does not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Started out Good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to be more comfortable. I had a green tea topper prior on my regular mattress, so I decided to try the actual memory foam mattress. Worst and bad decision. I truly wish that I would have held onto my mattress until after 3 months. My first 3 months were wonderful, but now my back, neck etc just always hurts. My sleep is restless. My 5 yr old gets better sleep on this than I do. I'm 5'1" and only 160 lbs. Very disappointed. I've added a green tea topper to try and help, no help at all. Worst decision ever
customer_reviews.author: CustomerT

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have now owned this mattress for over 6 months and am very happy with it. When I first unpacked it, and for the first month, I was not pleased at the strong odor (reading through the reviews others had complained this), which I thought was mold, but I read that this is from oils that the manufacturer uses which are natural. I simply encased the mattress cover to suppress the scent and eventually it went away. The mattress is wonderful. In the past I have purchased mattresses costing hundreds more than this which were nowhere near as comfortable. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Zinus Memory Foam 12 inch bed
customer_reviews.text: Read a ton of review on this bed and one similar here on amazon before I decided to buy. Decided to go with this bed (thanks to the pictures, this one looked better). Slept on it for 2 days, very happy with it so far. I had an old bed with a 3 inch mattress topper I paid $150 for - so I thought for another $100 why not just replace my whole bed. Glad I did! Will see how long the quality lasts, but when I got it, it fully inflated in about 24 hours (most of it within just the first 2 hours, but the corners took a little longer).
customer_reviews.author: CClife

customer_reviews.title: Sucks!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought several mattresses (memory foam) from amazon that have been great....however-this is the worst one we have gotten! There is a huge dip in the middle that when 2 people lay on it, you roll the the middle. If one person is laying on it, both the side curl up. This also did not expand fully, the corners appear to be missing something and the middle didn’t expand either. We are NOT happy!!!! And we are attempting to return this but are having a hard time getting back in the box!! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I think it was a great purchase and great value. We have it in our guest room and our granddaughter does not want to leave. It sleeps well. We used it also when we first moved in our new house because our bed had not arrived. It is soft sided so when you are close to the edge it may feel like you’re going to roll off but it sure is comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I received this mattress on thurs. Queen. 12 inch. I didn’t notice any smell the first night but the 2nd night I noticed a mildew/mold smell. It was really over powering. I contacted amazon the next morning and they refunded my $$$ and told me to throw it away, use it , or donate. I’m kind of bummed because it’s really a great queen mattress and so comfortable. I would order another but I’m nervous of the same problem. So bummed because we were about to order a 2nd for our guest room. I’m glad amazon had great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Y

customer_reviews.title: "My Neck, my back; my neck and my back!"
customer_reviews.text: So this bed is soooo firm that I literally tossed and turn all night. It's a memory foam that definitely catches your shape and holds you, but once you move it will expand out, that part I like. I'm a side sleeper and this just doesn't help me sleep at all. I woke up at I'll now just shop for a really plush mattress topper to go on top because I just can't with this bed alone. I woke up at 2am, didn't fall back asleep until 5am; not to mention my body is aching terribly this morning. I'm guessing a bed is something you really shouldn't buy online if you need something super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

product_meta.title: Zinus 12 Inch Green Tea Memory Foam Mattress / CertiPUR-US Certified / Bed-in-a-Box / Pressure Relieving, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style Name:12 Inch| Design:MattressThe recipe for our #1 best selling mattress? Refreshing green tea, plush-as-a-cotton-ball memory foam and over a decade of experience perfecting mattresses that make sleep a little more wonderful. Our Green Tea Memory Foam Mattress begins with our proprietary green tea and charcoal infused memory foam, because we’re fanatics about finding the sleep-enhancing qualities of natural ingredients. And boy, do these ingredients work! Antioxidant rich green tea helps keep your mattress fresh as a daisy, and ActivCharocal microparticles effectively block moisture that would otherwise lead to smelly smells. Precisely layered CertiPUR-US certified foams allow you to sink into this mattress just right, for a supportive feeling that cradles your achiest joints and aligns your spine. Open air pockets in the middle layer of comfort foam encourage airflow so you don’t overheat, and they also add extra comfort beneath areas that need it most, like the shoulders, hips and knees. A 10 year worry-free warranty is also included, so you can rest assured that we’ll take care of you should anything about it fall short of perfection. Simply put, this plush mattress is proof that sweet dreams really do come true.
feature_bullets: Green Tea-infused Memory Foam With a Soft, Poly Jacquard Cover

THE RIGHT COMBINATION - Our special recipe for rejuvenating rest? Refreshing green tea and moisture-absorbing Activ charcoal infused into pressure-relieving memory foam that cradles your shape so you awake free of aches and pains and fresh as a daisy
CERTIPUR US CERTIFIED - Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs

PRESSURE-RELIEVING FOAMS - 3 inches conforming memory foam, 2 inches soft, airflow enhancing comfort foam, and 7 inches durable, high density base support foam; ideal for side sleepers and petite to average weight sleepers
